August 30, 2016

New personal best!

So, I am very happy ! One year ago today, I weighed approximately 80 kg and I managed to deadlifts 80 kg. Well, yesterday I managed to dead lift 100 kg while weighing in at a much lighter 70kg! Thank you to take action personal training for the photograph and the help in reaching this personal best. I have not had much sleep this evening because in a few hours I have to visit the...

August 2, 2016

hit fit video

As well as having an hours Muay Thai training I am also doing a HIT FIT cardio class to boost my workouts. They are run by Take Action Personal Training and are really good fun and an excellent workout. I am not that impressed with my technique in this session/video as such but its more about fun and cardio after already doing special training. Here is a video from the You Tube channel Enjoy!

The drunk fist is my progress from a drunken developer into a full time carer who has stopped smoking, stopped drinking and started to take up boxing, muay thai, bjj, mma and generally just trying to be better.
